title: Bottomless Buckets
summaries: Bottomless Buckets are tools that are capable of placing an infinite amount of liquids by pressing the âš’ Use / Attack button. There are four different types of Bottomless Buckets, one for each type of liquid: Bottomless Water Bucket, Bottomless Lava Bucket, Bottomless Honey Bucket, and Bottomless Shimmer Bucket.

Bottomless Buckets can be used limitlessly and are never depleted. They are also slightly faster at placing liquids when compared to standard <linked>buckets</linked> (especially when moving the cursor around while placing).
